responses.greeting: Hello! Thank you for calling Call Adina. I'm your AI assistant. How can I help you today?
responses.fallback: I'm not sure about that. Let me connect you with someone who can help.
responses.goodbye: Thank you for calling Call Adina. Have a great day!
responses.hours: We're open 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Monday to Friday. If you're calling outside these hours, please leave a message or call back during business hours.
responses.services: We offer Customer Support, Appointments, General Information, and AI Voice Agent Services. Which service are you interested in?

voice.name: Sarah
voice.description: Young adult woman with a confident and warm, mature quality and a reassuring, professional tone.
